tool_description: Extracts structured data, trends, and key insights from charts, graphs, and data visualizations for alt text generation.

chart_url.description: URL or file path to the chart or graph image

chart_type.description: Type of chart: bar, line, pie, scatter, histogram, heatmap, treemap

extract_data_points.description: Whether to extract specific data values

focus_on_trends.description: Whether to emphasize trends and patterns over exact values

error_messages: Invalid chart URL: Provide a valid URL or accessible file path to the chart.
Unsupported chart type: Use one of [bar, line, pie, scatter, histogram, heatmap, treemap].
Chart recognition failed: The image may not contain a recognizable chart or data visualization.
Data extraction error: Unable to parse data from the chart format provided.
usage: Provide chart_url and chart_type, optionally set extract_data_points and focus_on_trends. The tool returns structured information about the chart's data, trends, and key insights.

chart_title.description: Title of the chart if available

data_series.description: Names of data series or categories

key_insights.description: Main trends, patterns, or notable features

data_range.description: Range of values represented in the chart

notable_points.description: Significant data points, outliers, or peaks
